import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { fetchGrades } from "./services/gradeServices" import { postStudentToDatabase } from "./services/studentServices" export const TestViewStudent = ({ user, viewStudentToggle, setViewStudentToggle }) => { const [grades, setGrades] = useState([]) const [studentForm, setStudentForm] = useState({}) const handleCreateStudent = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const copy = { ...studentForm, userId: user.id, studentCode: handleRandomNumber() } studentForm.firstName && studentForm.lastName && studentForm.gradeId ? postStudentToDatabase(copy).then(() => { setViewStudentToggle(false) }) : window.alert("please complete all fields") } const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchGrades().then((data) => { setGrades(data) }) } const handleRandomNumber = () => { // Generate a random number between 100,000 and 999,999 const min = 1000; const max = 9999; const randomOrderNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min; return randomOrderNumber } const handleStudentInput = (event) => { const copy = { ...studentForm } const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value copy[name] = value setStudentForm(copy) } const handleToggle = () => { setViewStudentToggle(!viewStudentToggle) setStudentForm({}) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, []) return ( <> {viewStudentToggle ?
